name: The VR Gallery
description: In this project, I brought together various previous experiences and projects from my art and multimedia studies, combining curation techniques, virtual modeling, and model-making to create a virtual and physical exhibition. My portfolio of work served as the theme for the show, as it showcases my growth and development as an artist over the course of my studies. I chose to present the exhibition in Virtual Reality, as it is a technology that I find both fascinating and underutilized. To add a human element and maintain a sense of physicality, I also created a reduced scale physical model of the exhibition space. Overall, this project allowed me to demonstrate my skills in curation, modeling, and exhibition design in both virtual and physical realms.
